ta.shape3D

Interface Animator.TemporarilyAnimable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Animator.Animable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MeshTA
    Enclosing class:
    Animator

    public static interface Animator.TemporarilyAnimable
extends Animator.Animable
    Derived from animable, this interface allows moreover object to be stopped by the Animator
    Author:
    S Firegreen

      Method which is called by the animator, when the object is interrupt
